hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah al-Muharibi: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: When a man stands with the intention of saying prayer, or if any of you says prayer, he should not spit before him, nor at his right side; but he should do so at his left side, if there is a place for it; or he should spit under his left foot and then rub it off

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْبُزَاقِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Spitting In A Masjid Is Disliked
